fullplot: NERV faces a brutal attack from SEELE, but with Asuka in a coma, and Shinji in a nervous breakdown, things soon turn into the surreal. This movie provides an concurrent ending to the final two episodes of the show "Neon Genesis Evangelion".
plot: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series "Shin Seiki Evangelion" (1995).
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
